#How to run the test suite

= Test in django-survey =
This reusable app comes with a test suite that is relatively complete. This project uses the regular [http://www.djangoproject.com/documentation/testing/ django test suite]. The test are located inside a folder called "tests". The doctests are spread in 3 files, they name are self explanatory :
  * test_images.py
  * test_models.py
  * test_urls.py


== How to run it ==
If you need a longer explanation on how to run the tests please read the  [http://www.djangoproject.com/documentation/testing/#running-tests django documentation] else the short version is illustrated below.

== Coverage ==
This [http://www.slideshare.net/guest18915c/an-app-in-a-week/ presentation] give a recipe to evaluate the coverage of your test suite.

{{{
# coverage.py -e
# coverage.py -x manage.py test survey
# coverage.py -r -m >report.txt
}}}
